Check out our latest Netherland dedicated hosting 
The significance of data and applications in business support is ever increasing and the Fujitsu servers are designed to meet these increasing demands.
These servers are the right sized option for any business looking to have a dedicated server hosting.
    

# Netherlands Dedicated Servers

=============================================


**Fujitsu 1**

    CPU:Intel Xeon E3-1270v6 3.80GHz
    RAM:8GB
    Storage:1 TB HDD or 250 GB SSD
    Outgoing Bandwidth: 5TB
    Incoming Bandwidth: unmetered
    Uplink:1 Gbps
    IPV4:1
    IPV6:/48
    DDOS Protection 20gbps by default      
   
* $68.95 USD/mo

[Order HDD](https://clients.hostsailor.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=510 "Order Now")

## To Check All Fujitsu plans please click [here](https://hostsailor.com/nl-dedicated-servers/ "here")

**Payment methods**


PayPal,Bitcoin, altcoins, Bank Transfer, PaySafeCard, Skrill, WebMoney, Western Union, Moneygram and Perfect Money

**Features**

1. Every dedicated is connected via a Gbit port by default.
2. Fully customize your server hardware.
3. No setup fees.
4. Managed services.
5. Free incoming bandwidth.
6. Uptime backed up by our SLA.
7. Full Remote Management and Control (reboot, rDNS, reinstall, check bandwidth).
8. No contracts.
